title: Inquiry-Based Mathematics and Science Learning Curriculum: PCK Development Strategies for Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematical concepts and basic familiarity with the scientific inquiry process
context.additional_context: Targeting mathematics and science education majors/students preparing for employment, project-based assessments are conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three educative features for inquiry-based science learning design to development documents within four weeks.
Learners can simulate a collaborative design process integrating academic expertise (cognitive science, physics, science education) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply responsive/proactive design strategies for PCK (Pedagogical Content Knowledge) development at least twice in real educational scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
